alert.note: Alert for Box Butte (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 6:22PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Box Butte County through 545 PM MDT... At 521 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wild Horse Butte, or 13 miles north of Alliance, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wild Horse Butte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska.
